sn19.10:1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ kumbhaṇḍaṃ purisaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ.
sn19.10:1.2: So gacchantopi teva aṇḍe khandhe āropetvā gacchati.
sn19.10:1.4: Tamenaṃ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19.10:1.6: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe gāmakūṭako ahosi …pe….
sn19.10:2.5: Yo ca sibbiyati sūcako hi so,
